front.title: The Approach for IPv4-only users to access IPv6-only Content

abstract.t: Current approaches can not solve the scenario that the users from IPv4 Internet to access IPv6-only content. When IPv6 content are becoming more and more popular, it is important to ensure that IPv6- only content can be reachable from legacy IPv4-only clients via some IPv4-only network. This document proposes two approaches for IPv4- only users to access IPv6-only content. It is designed to cover the Scenario 2 in [RFC6144].
